import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { menuService } from '../services/menu'; import MenuCard from '../components/menu/MenuCard'; import { Search, ChefHat, Clock, Star, ArrowRight, Users, Award, Truck } from 'lucide-react'; const HomePage = () => { const { isAuthenticated, isCaterer, user } = useAuth(); const [featuredMenus, setFeaturedMenus] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [stats] = useState({ totalCaterers: 150, totalOrders: 2500, happyCustomers: 1200 }); useEffect(() => { loadFeaturedMenus(); }, []); const loadFeaturedMenus = async () => { try { const menus = await menuService.getScheduledMenus({ limit: 3}) setFeaturedMenus(menus); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load featured menus:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Delicious Meals,
Delivered Fresh

We are passionate local caterers . Enjoy restaurant-quality meals prepared with love and delivered to your door.

{/* Reviews */}
Reviews from our customers -
{/* Decorative Elements */}
{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Get delicious meals in three simple steps

1

Browse & Choose

Explore menus from local caterers and choose your favorite dishes for any date.

2

Order & Pay

Place your order with delivery details and pay securely through our platform.

3

Enjoy

Receive your freshly prepared meal and enjoy restaurant-quality food at home.

{/* Featured Menus Section */}

Featured Menus

Discover today's most popular dishes

View All Menus

Check back soon for delicious new offerings!

)}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose MyCloudKitchen?

We connect you with passionate local caterers who create exceptional meals using fresh, quality ingredients.

Expert Caterers

Professional chefs and passionate home cooks creating authentic, delicious meals with years of experience and love for food.

Fresh & Fast

Meals prepared fresh daily and delivered quickly to maintain quality and taste. No compromises on freshness or flavor.

Quality Guaranteed

Every caterer is verified and rated by our community. 100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back.

{/* For Caterers Section */}

Are You a Talented Chef?

Join our community of passionate caterers and share your culinary creations with food lovers in your area. Grow your business with our platform.

Access to thousands of hungry customers
Build your reputation and brand
Flexible delivery options
Become a Caterer

Success Story

"MyCloudKitchen helped me turn my passion for cooking into a thriving business. I've served over 500 customers in just 6 months!"

Maria Rodriguez
Italian Cuisine Specialist
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Your Culinary Journey?

{isCaterer ? "Share your passion for cooking with the world. Join our community of caterers today." : "Discover amazing meals from talented caterers in your area. Order your first meal today." }

Order Food Become a Caterer
) : ( {isCaterer ? "Manage Your Kitchen" : "Start Ordering"} )}
); }; export default HomePage;
